creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: eleven total lines written on off-white paperboard with a narrow gold border; a mix of swirling, elegant characters and expressive calligraphy, with some kana; very small intaglio stamp at URC; oval relief stamp at LLC with only two characters
markings: URC, very small intaglio stamp; LLC, oval relief stamp; on back, LRC, in pencil: [Irie Shikai /1930 12th month]
title: Poem in Mixed Scripts
